boardgame.name: Abenteuer in Mittelerde
Middle-Earth Quest
La Quête des Terres du Milieu
Il Signore degli Anelli: Avventure nella Terra di Mezzo
ミドルアース・クエスト
boardgame.description: Middle-Earth Quest takes place approximately ten years after Bilbo Baggins leaves the Shire, and several years before Frodo leaves Bag End on his journey leading to the destruction of the One Ring. Thus, Middle Earth Quest will take place in a time of growing darkness. Players will take control of characters such as a Gondorian Captain, a Rider from the Westfold, or numerous other character types. Not only will characters be able to experience new adventure in Middle Earth, but we will carefully seek to tie in the experience with the massive amounts of lore and story that takes place around the edges of the central THE LORD OF THE RINGS storyline._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Middle-Earth Quest is a game of adventure and conflict set in the time leading up to the creation of the Fellowship. One player will adopt the mantle of Sauron and do his best to spread his evil influence across the lands. Up to three players become heroes and will do their best to foil Sauron's foul plots, and rally the peoples of Middle-earth to their side._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Fantasy Flight Games (FFG LTR11) It is a time of growing darkness and despair. Sauron the Great, the Dark Lord of Mordor, has returned to his ancient fastness of Barad-dûr. From there, his evil and corruption has spread across the lands once more. Alas, in the West, there is little strength left. The Elves have all but abandoned Middle-earth, and the blood of Númenór has run thin; that which remains now dwells in Minas Tirith, or with the lonely rangers that haunt the ruins and wild country of Arnor. Yet, there is still hope. Gandalf the Grey has learned that the One Ring, the master-ring which Sauron desires and fears above all, is with the hobbit Frodo in the Shire. And there are heroes! Heroes to aid Gandalf in his hunt for the creature Gollum, and in his quest for the lost knowledge of Isildur’s Bane. Heroes, whose strong arms guard the Shire from the enemy. Heroes, who venture into the forests of Ithilien, or even into the Land of Shadow itself, there to disrupt the schemes of Sauron, wherever they may be found. Middle-earth Quest is set in the seventeen-year period between Bilbo’s birthday party and the Ring’s departure from the Shire, as described in J.R.R. Tolkien’s novel The Lord of the Rings. One player takes the role of Sauron, who is attempting to dominate Middle-earth with his nefarious plots and evil minions. Up to three other players take the roles of heroes who must hold the darkness at bay until Gandalf’s plans have matured. To do so, the heroes must embark on dangerous quests and consult with the famous characters of Middle-earth to gain favor and knowledge. Will you play as Sauron and claim Middle-earth as your own? Or will you play as a hero and stand against the Dark Lord? The fate of Middle-earth rests in your hands! Middle-earth Quest contains: •1 Rulebook •1 Large Game Board (in two parts) 28.25_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; x 41_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; when put together •5 Plastic Hero Figures •5 Plastic Minion Figures •Over 225 tokens •More than 470 cards •5 Hero Sheets and 8 Plastic Stands Game design by Corey Koneiczka and Christian T. Petersen.

Fantasy Flight Games (FFGLTR11) It is a time of growing darkness and despair. Sauron the Great, the Dark Lord of Mordor, has returned to his ancient fastness of Barad-dûr. From there, his evil and corruption has spread across the lands once more. Alas, in the West, there is little strength left. The Elves have all but abandoned Middle-earth, and the blood of Númenór has run thin; that which remains now dwells in Minas Tirith, or with the lonely rangers that haunt the ruins and wild country of Arnor. Yet, there is still hope. Gandalf the Grey has learned that the One Ring, the master-ring which Sauron desires and fears above all, is with the hobbit Frodo in the Shire. And there are heroes! Heroes to aid Gandalf in his hunt for the creature Gollum, and in his quest for the lost knowledge of Isildur_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Bane. Heroes, whose strong arms guard the Shire from the enemy. Heroes, who venture into the forests of Ithilien, or even into the Land of Shadow itself, there to disrupt the schemes of Sauron, wherever they may be found. Middle-earth Quest is set in the seventeen-year period between Bilbo_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s birthday party and the Ring_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s departure from the Shire, as described in J.R.R. Tolkien_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s novel The Lord of the Rings. One player takes the role of Sauron, who is attempting to dominate Middle-earth with his nefarious plots and evil minions. Up to three other players take the roles of heroes who must hold the darkness at bay until Gandalf_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s plans have matured. To do so, the heroes must embark on dangerous quests and consult with the famous characters of Middle-earth to gain favor and knowledge. Will you play as Sauron and claim Middle-earth as your own? Or will you play as a hero and stand against the Dark Lord? The fate of Middle-earth rests in your hands!

Description: It is a time of growing darkness and despair. Sauron the Great, the Dark Lord of Mordor, has returned to his ancient fastness of Barad-dûr. From there, his evil and corruption has spread across the lands once more. Alas, in the West, there is little strength left. The Elves have all but abandoned Middle-earth, and the blood of Númenór has run thin; that which remains now dwells in Minas Tirith, or with the lonely rangers that haunt the ruins and wild country of Arnor.
Yet, there is still hope. Gandalf the Grey has learned that the One Ring, the master–ring which Sauron desires and fears above all, is with the hobbit Frodo in the Shire. And there are heroes! Heroes to aid Gandalf in his hunt for the creature Gollum, and in his quest for the lost knowledge of Isildur’s Bane. Heroes, whose strong arms guard the Shire from the enemy. Heroes, who venture into the forests of Ithilien, or even into the Land of Shadow itself, there to disrupt the schemes of Sauron, wherever they may be found. Middle-earth Quest is set in the seventeen-year period between Bilbo’s birthday party and the Ring’s departure from the Shire, as described in J.R.R. Tolkien’s novel The Lord of the Rings. One player takes the role of Sauron, who is attempting to dominate Middle-earth with his nefarious plots and evil minions. Up to three other players take the roles of heroes who must hold the darkness at bay until Gandalf’s plans have matured. To do so, the heroes must embark on dangerous quests and consult with the famous characters of Middle-earth to gain favor and knowledge. Will you play as Sauron and claim Middle-earth as your own? Or will you play as a hero and stand against the Dark Lord? The fate of Middle-earth rests in your hands!
Contents: * 1 Rulebook * 1 Gameboard * 5 Character cards * Over 470 game cards * More than 225 game tokens * High-quality, fully detailed plastic playing pieces including: 5 hero figures and 5 minion figures ******************************* Our Philosophy: We are not satisfied unless you are satisfied! It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s that simple. In business for over 5 years, we understand the most critical aspects of ecommerce. Deliver good value, keep you posted on that status of your order and be available for help should the need arise. Description: All games are new and still in factory shrink-wrap. How to place an Order? Via the BoardGameGeek “shopping cart” Note: If this is your first purchase on BoardGameGeek, Go to http://boardgamegeek.com/wiki/page/Marketplace_Buyer_Guide for more information. Payment: Payment via PayPal “Griffin@GriffinsToyChest.com” (PayPal Verified) Shipping: Griffin’s Toy Chest ships via USPS (2-3 day service) or Fed-Ex Ground (2-5 business days) to anywhere within the United States. You will receive a price quote for each shipping option and you choose which of these two shipping option best fits your needs. All shipments are made within 2-3 days of receiving your cleared PayPal payment. Note: feel free to combine items to reduce shipping cost. Returns: Our return policy mirrors our philosophy; we are not satisfied unless you are satisfied! You may return any unopened item within 30 days of delivery for a full refund of the purchase price less shipping costs. Simply contact us to make return arrangements. Note: if an item is damaged in transit, an item exchange will be made at no additional cost to the buyer. Note that we take special pains to package all of your items properly but in the event of the unforeseen, we have you covered!
Contact: Please contact us via email: Griffin@GriffinsToyChest.com: phone (M-F 9 AM -6PM EST) 1-888-228-3716; or mail: Griffins Toy Chest, P.O. Box 13731, Fairlawn, OH 44313

Bought new in shrink (yes I did) and fully sleeved it and it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s never been played. Time to make room for some new games and get this classic for a steal. It has a spare set of miniatures (in varying degrees of condition mostly good though). Sleeves are included! The box for this rather old game was slightly damaged while it was still in shrink. One of the corners had begun separating on the inner box and there is some damage on the outer box corresponding to the same corner. You can see from the photos what the condition is. The components were NEVER USED! The decks of cards were still in shrink and went straight into sleeves. So to be clear: The components of this are in literally new condition aside from being punched (and bagged) and cards taken from the cellophane and put directly into sleeves. Only the box has minor damage AND there is a spare set of miniatures to boot! Buyer pays shipping using whichever service they would prefer. I am in Chicago, IL (Zip Code 60625) if you would like to estimate what the shipping costs would be. I am not a store! I do not have shipping rates at my fingertips so it takes me exactly as much time as it would take you to figure out how much it would cost to ship using whichever service you prefer. The game will not fit into a FlatRate box so expect shipping to be slightly higher. The box it would ship in is 22_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; x 18_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; x 8_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; and weighs 9.5 pounds packed. All game box sides are covered in two layers of bubble-wrap and the rest of the box space is filled by firmly packed peanuts. I have several items for sale at the moment. Discounts on both the games and shipping if you purchase multiple items! See my listings here: https://boardgamegeek.com/geekmarket/user/Rapscallion_69
